content: basic raglan cardigan by hunglish knitter the cardigan is worked top down with raglan increases on the yoke the yoke is divided for body and sleeves and the body continued back and forth with circular needle the sleeves are worked in the round with magic loop technique sizes xs s m l xl finished measurements the sizes xs s m l xl are designed to fit an approximate bust circumference of 80-85 85-90 90-95 95-100 100-110 cm 31½-33½ 33½-35½ 35½-37½ 37½-39½ 39½-43¼ inches the cardigan is designed to have approx 5-10 cm 2-4 inches of positive ease gauge 18 sts x 24 row in stockinette stitch on 5 mm us8 needles = 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4 inches needles circular needles 5 mm us8 and 3 5 mm us4 yarn suggested yarn weight 4 medium-worsted or category c by drops yardage 1100 1200 1300 1400 1600 yards/ 1 000 1 100 1 200 1 300 1 500 meter shown here in baby rainbow yarn by loops & threads 100% polyester 5 3 oz / 150 g = 364 yd / 333 m 3 3 4 4 5 skeins raglan all increases are worked from the right side the raglan increases on the right side of the raglan stitches lean right m1r while the increases on the left side of the raglan stitches lean left m1l the increases are worked as follows see video at hunglish knitter youtube channel before the marker right-leaning increase m1r place the strand that runs between two stitches from back to front on the left needle then knit this strand after the marker left-leaning increase m1l place the strand that runs between two stitches from front to back on the left needle then knit this strand through the back loop twisted 1 yoke cast on 82 82 86 86 90 sts on the 3 5 mm circular needle neckband work rib as follows 1 edge stitch usually i slip the first/edge stitch * knit 2 purl 2 * work from *-* finish with 1 edge stitch usually i purl the last/edge stitch you make the rib as wide as you wish change to circular needle size 5 mm dividing for raglan divide the stitches for raglan increases without working the sts by placing markers on both sides of the 2 raglan sts a total of 8 stitch markers as follows after the edge stitch 14 14 15 15 16 sts left front 2 raglan sts 8 sts for every size left sleeve 2 raglan sts 28 28 30 30 32 sts back 2 raglan sts 8 sts right sleeve 2 raglan sts 14 14 15 15 16 sts right front and 1 edge stitch raglan increases & elevation now work short row to shape the neckline while at the same
